game_description: Art Plunge is a gallery where you can get the feeling of being inside famous paintings. This is a short but sweet experience featuring 5 VR interpretations of the following artworks: Mona Lisa, Starry Night, The Birth of Venus, The Creation of Adam and Girl Reading a Letter at an Open Window
Supported Controllers: Touch (as Gamepad), Touch Controllers, Hand Tracking
Languages: English, Chinese (China), Chinese (Hong Kong), Chinese (Taiwan), Greek, Japanese, Swedish
review_1: This demo shows the potential of VR for art and education. By the time of this review, there are only 5 paintings available to "plunge" in, but I'm hoping they will expand the gallery by the time if goes to the regular store.
review_2: Well done and thank you. This is really impressive work.
review_3: Who doesn't want to walk into a great work of art? My first reaction was "Wow." Please add more art. I would love some Millais or Waterhouse.
review_4: Please... more art. We are all happy to pay money for each new painting you add! I'd pay $10 per painting!
review_5: It's obvious they put a lot of work into this. amazing quality, extremely well made, impeccable detail. Well worth the price of admission. Please make more, I'll buy them all. Even Goya's Black Paintings.
